title: 3.1 Master Challenge 3
question:
Any numeric value can be converted to a String but can all Strings be converted to a numeric value? What would happen if you try to convert a String chars = 12$34 to an integer value?
Check on the Python platform
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - javascript - R - pseudocode - java

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
